name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a pan, cook the ground beef until browned.
Add the onion and garlic, and cook until soft.
Mix in the tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Boil the fettuccine according to the package instructions.
In a pan, cook the chicken until golden.
Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Mix in the cream and parmesan cheese, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the fettuccine.
